plot: The story of RAMIRO, a young boy, who is leaving to war; his return and his missing with the love of his life, LAURINDA.
title: Dios no quiso
plot_es: The story of RAMIRO, a young boy, who is leaving to war; his return and his missing with the love of his life, LAURINDA.
plot_en: The story of RAMIRO, a young boy, who is leaving to war; his return and his missing with the love of his life, LAURINDA.
